name: Review Roster
tag_list: review, developers, publishers, sponsored, ads, posts, bloggers, iphone, android, web-apps, apps, applications
overview:
Review Roster connects developers and publishers in a breath taking way to publish reviews of amazing applications. With Review Roster, publishers get paid for reviewing applications, while developers get the desired coverage. In this competitive application space, it is extremely hard to get recognized, and thus Review Roster helps developers get the desired coverage.

Review Roster is a totally transparent system, and all reviews published via the platform are completely unbiased. Review Roster makes the marketing process for developers extremely easy, and helps developers make their Apps more discoverable.
